item.description:
Hi everyone! I'm going to head on over to the bar at Big City at 7, please come join me when you can for drinks and/or food. I figure at 8:30 we can head on over to Brighton Music Hall. Big City is just the next block over from the venue, and is in the same building as the Sunset Bar & Grill, but upstairs. I will send out my contact info in an email to those going.

Concert info:

Advance Box Office Price $15, 18+ show, Doors are at 8 PM, the show starts at 9 PM. Opening act - Class Actress.
item.name: Metronomy
